title: Voices: Advisers Need a Plan for When Boomers Spend Down Assets—Robert Glovsky
text:
Robert J. Glovsky is vice chair and a principal of the Colony Group in Boston. Voices is an occasional feature of edited excerpts in which wealth managers address issues of interest to the advisory community.
